name: Aisle
description:
Aisle is a game that can be played on mobile devices and browsers. In this game you control a ball. Don't drop the ball down while changing the direction. Collect the golden cubes and earn points for each new aisle you switch.

WEBSITE: https://retoxin.com

YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4I-_eb73BcRHfC7XiWUDjw?view_as=subscriber

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/retoxxin

FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/retoxxin

INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/retoxingames/
